statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.ContactID , AA.Position , AA.AssignedTask , AA.Description
, BB.Name as ContactName , BB.PersonType , BB.Email , BB.PhoneNo , BB.MobileNo , BB.FaxNo
FROM dbo.TCustomerContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TContact BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ContactID = BB.ID WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TCustomerContact AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TCustomerContact ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, CustomerID, ContactID, Position, AssignedTask, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #CustomerID#, #ContactID#, #Position#, #AssignedTask#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TCustomerContact SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , ContactID = #ContactID# , Position = #Position# , AssignedTask = #AssignedTask# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
